sys_script_include.description: Global helper for AI in a Box scoped app. Provides impersonation since gs.impersonate() is global-scope only.
sys_script_include.name: AIABGlobalHelper

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_1380618c83a2f2104d4fccb6feaad38e
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.AIABGlobalHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Global helper for AI in a Box scoped app. Provides impersonation since gs.impersonate() is global-scope only.</description><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>AIABGlobalHelper</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var AIABGlobalHelper = Class.create();
AIABGlobalHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
	getUserName: function(userId){
		var sys_user = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
		if(sys_user.get(userId)){
			return sys_user.getValue('user_name');
		}
		return "NO USER FOUND with userId " + userId;
	},

    impersonate: function(userId) {
        gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4 ENTRY");
        if (!userId) {
            gs.warn("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate: No userId provided");
            return null;
        }
        var originalUser = gs.getUserID();
		var originalUserName = this.getUserName(originalUser);
        gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: attempting " + userId + " from " + originalUser + '['+originalUserName+']');
        gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: calling gs.impersonate");
        
        var result = gs.impersonate(userId);
        
        gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: result=" + result);
        
        var newUser = gs.getUserID();
        gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: now running as " + newUser);
        
        if (newUser === userId) {
            gs.info("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: SUCCESS");
            return originalUser;
        } else {
            gs.warn("AIABGlobalHelper.impersonate v4: FAILED - still " + newUser);
            return null;
        }
    },

    revert: function(originalUserId) {
        if (originalUserId) {
            try {
                gs.impersonate(originalUserId);
            } catch (e) {
                gs.warn("AIABGlobalHelper.revert failed: " + e);
            }
        }
    },

    type: "AIABGlobalHelper"
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>opencode</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-15 06:39:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>1380618c83a2f2104d4fccb6feaad38e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AIABGlobalHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_1380618c83a2f2104d4fccb6feaad38e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-22 15:32:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
